name: Heithem
aboutpara: A self-taught web developer who loves combining the worlds of logic and creative design to make eye-catching, accessible, and user-friendly websites. I am a fast learner with pure love for challenges and lots of motivation, with a passion to learn new technologies.

projects.title: Locasa
projects.longDescription: Locasa is a mobile application for the local brands community in Tunisia. It allows users to discover, shop, and review local products and services.
projects.architecture: The app uses a microservices architecture with React Native on the frontend and Node.js (ExpressJS) on the backend. Real-time communication is central to the experience, enabling guests and hotel staff to interact without language barriers. MongoDB supports scalable data storage.

projects.title: Hotelna
projects.longDescription: Hotelna is a mobile app revolutionizing hotel communication. Its chat-based interface seamlessly translates messages between clients and hotel staff, breaking language barriers. Users can reserve rooms, access information, and rate their experience, enhancing guest satisfaction.
projects.architecture: The app uses a microservices architecture with React Native on the frontend and Node.js (ExpressJS) on the backend. Real-time communication is central to the experience, enabling guests and hotel staff to interact without language barriers. MongoDB supports scalable data storage.

projects.title: Vaistat
projects.longDescription: Vaistat is an e-health mobile application designed to optimize medication delivery and streamline healthcare staffing. The platform connects pharmacies, healthcare providers, and patients within a seamless ecosystem. It includes QR-based communication between clients and drivers, prescription management, and smart delivery logistics using intelligent pickup and route optimization algorithms. A driver-facing app enables real-time delivery tracking, job prioritization, and wallet management.
projects.architecture: The application is built following clean architecture and domain-driven design principles. The backend leverages Node.js with Express, PostgreSQL for relational data storage, and Redis for caching and session handling. The mobile application, developed with React Native and TypeScript, is structured for modular scalability and high performance.

projects.title: Vinty
projects.longDescription: Vinty is a mobile application focused on helping users locate vending machines throughout Austria. It utilizes geolocation and an interactive map interface to display nearby vending machines along with detailed product listings. Built with the Expo SDK and Maps API integration on both the frontend and backend, Vinty provides a seamless and informative experience for users navigating vending machine options.
projects.architecture: Vinty follows a modular architecture. The frontend is built using React Native with Expo SDK 52 for streamlined development and deployment. It leverages the Maps API for geospatial data, showing vending machine locations and allowing product search. The backend interacts with map services using secure API keys and returns structured data consumed by the app.

projects.title: Hansehuepfer
projects.longDescription: Hansehuepfer is a comprehensive web platform designed for a German tourism company specializing in guided tours around Hamburg. The website features an intuitive booking system, interactive tour maps, and a content management system that allows the client to easily update tour information and manage bookings.
projects.architecture: The application follows a JAMstack architecture with server-side rendering for optimal SEO performance. The backend API is built with Node.js and Express, connected to a MongoDB database for storing tour data and booking information.

projects.title: I&H Polymer Engineering
projects.longDescription: I&H Polymer Engineering required a professional corporate website to showcase their engineering services and products. The website features a modern design with detailed product catalogs, technical specifications, and a contact system for business inquiries. The site is fully responsive and optimized for all devices.
projects.architecture: The website is built as a static site using Gatsby.js for optimal performance and security. Content is managed through a headless CMS, allowing the client to easily update product information and technical specifications without developer intervention.

services.title: Mobile Builder
services.description: We help with the creation and development of your mobile application, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Web Builder
services.description: We help you build you website from scratch.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React,ReactNative Javascript, and most of the Web and Mobile frameworks.

experiences.bullets: I contributed to the AI team by developing innovative AI-driven KYC solutions based on the MCP (Model Contact Protocol). My responsibilities included designing robust systems for validating KYC data to ensure regulatory compliance and fraud prevention. I integrated machine learning models to automate risk detection and improve process efficiency. Working closely with cross-functional teams I deployed real-time applications that significantly enhanced KYC workflows for enterprise-scale environments.

I worked on Vaistat an e-health mobile application focused on facilitating the delivery of medicaments and job placement in the healthcare sector. I implemented features that optimized logistical operations and improved job-matching algorithms. Emphasizing user-centric design I ensured a seamless and intuitive experience tailored for both healthcare providers and patients contributing to the appâ€™s reliability and user engagement.

experiences.position: Web and Mobile Developer at Kayros
experiences.bullets: I played a key role in enhancing the Kayros Wallet application ensuring stability rapid issue resolution and user satisfaction. I implemented comprehensive unit testing for protocol-level communication and expanded language support to 41 languages making the product globally accessible. I integrated Kayros with WalletConnect Explorer to enable seamless DApp connectivity. I introduced PostHog for advanced product analytics including A/B testing heatmaps and feature flags empowering data-driven decision-making.

experiences.position: Web and Mobile Developer at WhiteCape
experiences.bullets: I actively contributed to several web and mobile development projects including the full development lifecycle of two mobile apps. I supervised and mentored three final-year engineering students whose projects all graduated with honors fostering both technical excellence and leadership within the team. My mentorship and guidance during this period contributed to a dynamic and growth-oriented environment.

education.universityPara: Graduated with honors in Computer Science and Multimedia
Graduated with honors in Computer Science and Multimedia
